page.title: 20Pastimes
page.content: {Guides, by Nicola.} On Friday nights I go to Guides.We play lots of different games. The best game is called Flags. We get ourselves into groups and take turns to find the flag of the country called out by our Cap- tain. We then have to go back to our group and tell them the colours of the flag. One week at Guides we all made bird's puddings.But when I hung mine in my garden, none of the birds had any! Nicola Cornwall, Marian Vian. {Louise's Hobby-Swimming.} I swim at Crystal Palace which is an international sports centre. There are four swimming pools. There are lessons for people to learn to swim and dive.In the racing pool they have a large part for the public to use. I am working for my gold award and can swim 16 lengths. Louise Etheridge, Marian Vian.
